page.title: 11Wragby Town Hall
page.content:
{WRAGBY'S CHIEF SOCIAL AMENITY { {Wragby Town Hall}is a place where people get together.They might play bingo,chat,drink tea or dance and sing.Shows and plays are put on and {the hall is used for all sorts of {functions.
The Town Hall was built by Thornes' of Wragby and work started in 1953.Since then a stage and dressing rooms have been added,and,more recently,an extension and new kitchen have been built,at a cost of 4000 pounds.{The Town Hall now {consists of 8 rooms_}main hall,small hall,kitchen,bar room,stage and dressing rooms,lighting bay and toilets. The main room can be hired for private functions.This costs 32 pounds
